name: TRIGGERcommand
0:
”Alexa, launch TRIGGER command”
”Alexa, ask TRIGGER command to run Calculator on Office PC”
”Alexa, tell TRIGGER command to trigger Notepad on Office PC”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trigger command
Developer Terms of Use
des:
- Login at www.triggercmd.com.
- Download and install an agent on your computer. It will prompt for the token during the install. 
- Go to the Instructions page in your triggercmd.com account, and copy the token.
- Paste the token from the Instructions page into your agent to log it in.
- Your computer will now show up in your www.triggercmd.com account. 
- Click Edit and add a voice trigger to your computer.
- Add the TRIGGER command skill in your Alexa app.
- Link your Alexa account to your TRIGGERcmd.com account.
- Say: Alexa, open TRIGGER command.
- Say: run Calculator on Office (use your own computer's voice trigger instead of "Office")

This skill works just like the original TRIGGERcmd skill. You might prefer this skill's invocation name.

You might prefer the "TRIGGERcmd Smart Home" skill that creates a virtual Alexa Smart Home switch for each command, so you can say, "Alexa, turn on Calculator."
